io.sphere.sdk.commands

Interface Command<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the result of the command, most likely the updated entity without expanded references
    All Superinterfaces:
    SphereRequest<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ByIdDeleteCommand<T>, CreateCommand<T>, DeleteCommand<T>, UpdateCommand<T>, UpdateCommandDsl<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByIdDeleteCommandImpl, CartCreateCommand, CartDeleteCommand, CartDiscountCreateCommand, CartDiscountDeleteCommand, CartDiscountUpdateCommand, CartUpdateCommand, CategoryCreateCommand, CategoryDeleteCommand, CategoryUpdateCommand, ChannelCreateCommand, ChannelDeleteCommand, ChannelUpdateCommand, CommandImpl, CreateCommandImpl, CustomerChangePasswordCommand, CustomerCreateCommand, CustomerCreateEmailTokenCommand, CustomerCreateTokenCommand, CustomerDeleteCommand, CustomerGroupCreateCommand, CustomerGroupDeleteCommand, CustomerGroupUpdateCommand, CustomerPasswordResetCommand, CustomerSignInCommand, CustomerUpdateCommand, CustomerVerifyEmailCommand, CustomObjectCustomJsonMappingUpsertCommand, CustomObjectDeleteCommand, CustomObjectUpsertCommand, DiscountCodeCreateCommand, DiscountCodeDeleteCommand, DiscountCodeUpdateCommand, ExperimentalProductImageUploadCommand, InventoryDeleteCommand, InventoryEntryCreateCommand, InventoryEntryUpdateCommand, OrderFromCartCreateCommand, OrderImportCommand, OrderUpdateCommand, ProductCreateCommand, ProductDeleteCommand, ProductTypeCreateCommand, ProductTypeDeleteCommand, ProductUpdateCommand, ReviewCreateCommand, ReviewDeleteCommand, ReviewUpdateCommand, ShippingMethodCreateCommand, ShippingMethodDeleteCommand, ShippingMethodUpdateCommand, StateCreateCommand, StateDeleteCommand, StateUpdateCommand, TaxCategoryCreateCommand, TaxCategoryDeleteCommand, UpdateCommandDslImpl, ZoneCreateCommand, ZoneDeleteCommand, ZoneUpdateCommand

    public interface Command<T>
extends SphereRequest<T>
    A command represents a request to update the state of SPHERE.io entities.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest

        canDeserialize, deserialize, httpRequestIntent
